statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} -3 \\ -2 \\ 3 \\ 1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 0 \\ -4 \\ -3 \\ 1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 9 \\ 10 \\ -6 \\ -4 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -33 \\ -22 \\ 33 \\ 11 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 2 \\ 3 \\ -1 \\ 0 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 3 \\ -1 \\ 3 \\ 2 \end{array}\right]\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
